description: This Java class defines a REST controller named HelloController that provides basic endpoints for the flightstatusservice application, including a welcome message, redirect to Swagger UI documentation, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for the flight status service, including greeting, documentation redirect, health check, and info endpoints.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message for the flightstatusservice.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects the client to the Swagger UI documentation page, preserving the original request's scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Responds with 'OK' indicating the application's health status.
